MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA18 postcode area of Cumnock, affecting properties in Cairnscadden Road and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and due to a faulty underground cable on Cairnscadden Road we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown as soon as possible. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.56pm on Saturday 6th February 2021.
